title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: Bitcoin Cash (BCH) Gains 4.2%, Leading Index Higher
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Near Protocol (NEAR) joined Bitcoin Cash (BCH) as a top performer, rising 3.7% from Wednesday.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 2468.7, up 1.2% (+29.84) since 4 p.m. ET on Wednesday.

Eighteen of 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: BCH (+4.2%) and NEAR (+3.7%).

Laggards: APT (-1.4%) and FIL (-1.1%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The CoinDesk 20 Index is up 1.2% with 18 of 20 assets trading higher, indicating broad market gains and positive momentum.
